content: husk crows cornfields and paranormal scarecrows combine to make a creepy horror classic a small la cid 427 ce pa cid 425 ern and a modified basket weave s cid 415 tch are used to give the impression of straw materials 100 grams fingering weight yarn size 2 25 mm needles or size to obtain gauge gauge 32 stitches and 40 rounds to 4 inches in pattern the sock is written for size medium and large there are separate charts for the top of the leg and the leg/instep pattern cast on 64 72 k2 p2 rib for 12 row @2025 barbara richardson leg increase 2 stitches on size medium only for a total of 66 72 sts work 3 rounds in garter stitch p one round knit one round p one round work leg chart a 11 12 times for each round repeat the chart through round 8 three times next work 4 rounds in garter stitch yes an extra round decreasing 2 stitches on size medium only 64 72 sts work leg and instep chart b 8 9 times per round repeat chart b through round 6 a total of 7 times or longer if preferred heel flap row 1- *sl 1 k1* repeat from * across 32 36 sts turn row 2 sl 1 p 31 35 turn repeat these two row 16 18 times total heel turn row 1- sl 1 k16 18 ssk k1 turn row2 - sl 1 p3 p2tog p1 turn row 3- sl 1 k to 1 st before gap ssk k 1 turn row 4 sl 1 p to 1 st before gap p2tog p 1 turn continue with row 3 and 4 only until all stitches are used 18 20 sts left gusset resume working in the round k 18 20 heel stitches pick up and k16 18 sts alongside edge knit one in corner to close gap between gusset and instep k across 32 36 instep stitches following chart b knit one in corner to close gap between gusset and instep pick up k16 18 sts alongside heel flap edge and k 9 10 from heel this is the new beginning of the round 84 94 stitches 32 36 instep and 52 58 gusset gusset decreases round 1 work to last 3 sts until instep then k2tog k1 work instep following chart b k1 ssk k to end round 2- even continue these two rounds until 64 72 sts remain work instep as established and knit sole stitches until 2 2 5 inches shorter than desired length k one row k to beginning of instep this is now bor toe knit every round round 1- *k1 ssk k to last 3 sts k2tog k1* repeat **once more round 2 -even repeat these 2 rounds until 36 sts remain then repeat round 1 every round until 20 stitches remain kitchener toe seam @2025 barbara richardson chart a chart b @2025 barbara richardson
